articles.author: ET Online
articles.title: "Mehul Choksi’s wallet is full...": PNB scam whistle-blower explains why extradition won’t be easy
articles.description: Sources say Choksi was arrested in Belgium on Saturday after local authorities confirmed his presence in the country. Sources further stated that preparations were being made for his extradition to India.
articles.content: Fugitive businessman Mehul Choksi has reportedly been arrested in Belgium, but Punjab National Bank (PNB) scam whistle-blower Hariprasad SV believes that bringing him back to India will be very diffi… [+2346 chars]
